Damnit you morons are real stupid.
If the situation were so poor, that _every_ ranked match was skewed against the player, then your _opponent_ would experience identical problems.

The fact that you _routinely_ perceive that the opponent team gets away without harm is proof that the whole thing operates **significantly** better than you moronically perceive it in your unclear, self-biased, self-prophesizing perception / assumption.

Damnit you people are stupid for carrying this on for so long!
